Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the photo shows Trump receiving treatment after contracting the novel coronavirus when in fact, the image has been doctored.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it relies on a doctored image that has been widely shared on social media platforms.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that the image is genuine and depicts Trump receiving treatment, without verifying its authenticity.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the image is a doctored version of a stock photo and does not show Trump receiving treatment for COVID-19.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the image is not genuine and has been manipulated.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in the provided claim.
Falters at times: There is no evidence of the claim faltering at times bias in the provided claim.
